name: Flipstown
description:
FLIPSTOWN is a game about a brave guy who started his journey underground. He is in for trouble in the form of ancient druids who guard the wealth of their people. Kill everyone on your way to reach the goal. The game has 15 levels, a final boss, 4 types
of weapons.

FLIPSTOWN is a bagel with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room and get to the final.

Game Features:
-Pixel graphics
-Hero weapon upgrade system
- Final Boss
-After killing the final boss, a new game mode opens
